text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump https://t.co/5JPlhu2Sai Tell your F buddy that the ONLY way out of this mess is finding a vaccine. YOU don't FIRE experts involved in producing one. YOU don't pull out of a WORLDWIDE initiative because of politics. YOU don't urge the public back into the public square without 1.
